cast.name: 纳西姆·阿达比 Nasim Adabi
雷萨·阿克拉吉拉德 Reza Akhlaghirad

introduction: Aban is a forest ranger who has to get married in another month. In a chase with wood smugglers, he finds a little girl on the road who has died. Everyone doubts that he must have had an accident with the child, but Aban does not admit it, but admits that he killed a girl 15 years ago in such a situation and secretly buried her. The police ask him for a sign or a document, but he has no evidence -and even the place where he buried the child has become a highway.
